**Equation typing**

========================================================

                         Solve the following equations:
                
1. ## \[(dy/dx) + (1/x)y = 3x+4\] 

2. ## \[(dy/dx) + (2/x)y = 3x+1\]

3. ## \[y'-y = cosx\]

4. ## \[(3y+sin 2x) dx - dy = 0\]

5. ## \[(y-1)sin x dx - dy = 0\]

6. ## \[y'cos^2 x + y - 1 = 0\]

7. ## \[y' + 3x^2y = x^2y^3\]

8. ## \[y' - y = x^3\sqrt{y}\]

9. ## \[yy' - 2 y^2 = e^x\]

10. ## \[y' + (1/x)y = x\sqrt{y}\]





Source of the euations: [a college level math textbook](http://college.cengage.com/mathematics/larson/calculus_early/3e/shared/chapter15/clc7eap1502.pdf)
